cite: Ebert, J. E. J., & Prelec, D. (2007). The Fragility of Time: Time-Insensitivity and Valuation of the Near and Far Future. Management Science. http://doi.org/10.1287/mnsc.1060.0671

data_columns.subjID: A unique identifier for each subject in the data-set.
data_columns.delay_later: An integer representing the delayed days for the later option (e.g. 1, 6, 28).
data_columns.amount_later: A floating point number representing the amount for the later option (e.g. 10.5, 13.4, 30.9).
data_columns.delay_sooner: An integer representing the delayed days for the sooner option (e.g. 0).
data_columns.amount_sooner: A floating point number representing the amount for the sooner option (e.g. 10).
data_columns.choice: If amount_later was selected, choice == 1; else if amount_sooner was selected, choice == 0.
